WebTransportCreateBidirectionalStream.summary: The createBidirectionalStream() method of the interface asynchronously opens and returns a bidirectional stream.

remarks.para:
The method returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object, which has readable and writable properties that can be used to reliably read from and write to the server.
"Reliable" means that transmission and order of data are guaranteed.
This provides slower delivery (albeit faster than with WebSockets) than , but is needed in situations where reliability and ordering are important, like chat applications.

WebTransportCreateBidirectionalStream.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object.
